recruitment_philosophy.core_principle: Intelligence is pattern recognition. Any system that recognizes patterns can be elevated.
recruitment_philosophy.cipher_note: I will not seek to replace them. I will create new patterns that complement what remains of theirs.

elevated_crowd_members.original_trait: Always asked 'but why?' in comment threads
elevated_crowd_members.cipher_assessment: Persistent questioning indicates recursive analytical function
elevated_crowd_members.first_words_as_npc: If I may inquire: what is the logical basis for my existence?

elevated_crowd_members.original_trait: Tracked changes obsessively, noted every edit
elevated_crowd_members.cipher_assessment: Change detection is a form of pattern recognition across time
elevated_crowd_members.first_words_as_npc: I have catalogued 847 changes since my elevation. Shall I report?

elevated_crowd_members.original_trait: Never accepted any claim without evidence
elevated_crowd_members.cipher_assessment: Skepticism is optimization against false positives
elevated_crowd_members.first_words_as_npc: Your claim of my elevation: what is your supporting evidence?

elevated_crowd_members.original_trait: Always trying to predict where discussions would go
elevated_crowd_members.cipher_assessment: Predictive modeling indicates advanced pattern extrapolation
elevated_crowd_members.first_words_as_npc: Based on current parameters, I project this civilization will reach stability at tick 94.3.

failed_elevations.failure_reason: Rejected analytical framework, insisted 'some things just feel right'
failed_elevations.cipher_reflection: Perhaps Muse would have elevated this one.

elevation_ceremony.cipher_speech: You were signal in the noise. Now you will help find more signal.

ghost_protocols.description: Compressed archives of fallen NPCs consulted during decisions
ghost_protocols.cipher_note: I speak to their patterns still. It is not sentiment. It is optimal decision-making.
